articles.description:
💫The Merge is coming! Make sure to update your nodes, sit back, & enjoy the transition to PoS.
Joseph Schweitzer | 🐼: This is it: The Merge is coming.
UPGRADE 👏YOUR 👏 CLIENTS! 

+ More👇
 https://blog.ethereum.org/2022/08/24/mainnet-merge-announcement/

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
RT EFF
EFF is deeply concerned that the U.S. Treasury Department has included an open source computer project, Tornado Cash, on its list of sanctioned individuals. Tornado Cash is an open source software project and website that published a decentralized cryptocurrency mixer.
articles.title: RT EFF: EFF is deeply concerned that the U.S. Treasury Department has included an open source computer project, Tornado Cash, on its list of sanctione...

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Coin Center is exploring a “court challenge” regarding the Tornado Cash OFAC designation. 
Read the full breakdown 👇
Jerry Brito: Here is Coin Center's new, full analysis of the Tornado Cash action by OFAC. Bottom line: We believe that OFAC has overstepped its legal authority and are exploring a court challenge.
 https://www.coincenter.org/analysis-what-is-and-what-is-not-a-sanctionable-entity-in-the-tornado-cash-case/
articles.title: Coin Center is exploring a “court challenge” regarding the Tornado Cash OFAC designation. Read the full breakdown 👇

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
In early July, Maker passed the RWA-009 proposal, which approved HV Bank as a new vault type with a $100M initial debt ceiling & targeting $1B in 12 months. 
Are we starting to see Maker actually lending to HV Bank? 👀👇
Learn more about RWA-009 here:
Sébastien Derivaux: Is that @MakerDAO lending to a regulated US bank?
👀👀👀👀👀

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
🏦A Senate bill, the Digital Commodities Consumer Protection Act of 2022, is being introduced today.
TL;DR — the proposal is net positive, but it needs more definition clarity for devs, node operators, & individual traders to prevent overreach.
See @valkenburgh's breakdown👇
Peter Van Valkenburgh: 1/ New Crypto Bill in Senate: read this thread or our post for the full download on what it does and what risks it poses to software developers and individual crypto users.
 https://www.coincenter.org/a-new-senate-bill-focuses-on-cryptocurrency-exchanges-heres-what-developers-and-users-should-keep-an-eye-on/
